title: Furnished & Spacious 2-bdr A/C av August 12
posting_body: ['My 2-bdr furnished apartment is available starting August 12.', 'Video tour available upon request', 'Fully disinfected with Eco-friendly, non-toxic, EPA certified "Clean Republic" product', 'Conveniently located close to the Marin City/Sausalito Hi 101 exit, furnished with a truly charming Provencal touch, this 1020 sq/ft apartment has 2 bedroom and one bathroom.', 'Each of the large bedrooms have a very comfortable queen-size bed, and one is in a charming loft.', 'One of the bedrooms is looking onto MLK park.', 'The apartment is next to the Sausalito Campus of the Lycee Français of San Francisco and The New Village School and of course MLK Park.', 'A/C in the apartment is quite a plus during Summer!', 'Washer/Dryer and Parking', 'Wifi, water and garbage are included.', 'Electricity and gas are re-invoiced based on PGE information.', 'Located in a small mall', "One block away from Molly Stone's market and next to bike path and hiking trails.", 'Top reviews on a major short-term rental website available upon request', '1 month minimum lease (+$350 for only one month).', 'Long term tenants preferred.', 'Electricity and gas payable by guests based on consumption.', 'Pets might be accepted depending on size, cleanliness, and quietness.']
